title: Imac A1224, LCD Backlight
message:
Hey guys, 

I need a opinion about this LCD! 

When i start the machine the LCD goes to wine color and slowly goes to normal color! After 4-5 minutes the backlight goes down!  

anyone have the experience of open this LCD's and repair the backlight ?? Like the LCD's from Model A1312  ??

I already repair 7-8 LCD's of model A1312, without to disassembly all LCD i can solder 7-8 cables and usually i can solve the problem of backlight! 

My question is, it is possible to repair this model like A1312? I know one model have strips off leds other i think it s a lamp! 

Anyone have the experience to repair the LCD backlight off A1224 ?? Or only solve buying another one ? 

thanks

title: Imac A1224, LCD Backlight
message: This sounds like a bad GPU to me being this is an old dinosaur...

title: Imac A1224, LCD Backlight
message:
Yes it's a old dinosaur!! heheh i don't will repair this one! 

This post can be closed! Thanks
